content:
Today I chose PR 17757 for discussion!

refactor(*): generalize typeclass assumptions in morphisms
Created by @Violeta Hernández (@vihdzp) on 2024-10-15
Labels: WIP, merge-conflict, t-algebra

Is this PR still relevant? Any recent updates? Anyone making progress?
Don't currently have time to do this, but it'd be cool if someone else did
At least for the most basic ones
